A Bronx deli shooting left one dead and four injured, while violence marred the West Indian Day Parade with six shot and one slashed; additionally, a Brooklyn motorcycle crash resulted in one fatality and two injuries, highlighting ongoing public safety concerns in New York City.

### Emergencies & Risks

Multiple violent incidents in the Bronx and Brooklyn raise concerns about public safety during holiday celebrations.

- Bronx deli shooting leaves 1 dead and 4 wounded; 5 suspects are in custody. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Six people were shot and one slashed as the West Indian Day Parade concluded. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- A motorcycle crash in Brooklyn resulted in one fatality and two injuries. [Read](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMigAFBVV95cUxOY3hGNVFadTV4dVlOdi1CdmxXbEZiYjNVbnk3dkpLSDNmVTZkU09HZ2k2WlAxdF9BUjVRWHpQNnNRVjI1U04yOW82RVdqcFZtdUYtZUVRRy1ILUFkQkFoZFZoa2d4ekNBcTY2MUNrQXdBbWh3OUJ6VEZSNGlyRVdkaQ?oc=5)
- At least three people were injured in a boat crash in the East River. [Read](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMijwFBVV95cUxNTFhuR2xFSDNJckFYV2hQLUZJWW1qTEFSUWRzT1RrZFA4dUpjQ1NqOGdxVGJkQzdCYUVLYWItU1lHODJRZGtNamo4Sm5XNlFOSXdoVjZDUkhUY3AydnFUYUZLQ2Z6MnJOUEJvOWI3bXdhN2Q2OXdMZFB2T1NJRnc1bTREVTJ2T200WEJncUU4Yw?oc=5)

### Transportation

NYC subway service experienced its worst summer in seven years, according to MTA data.

- MTA reports NYC's subway service faced significant disruptions this summer, marking the worst performance in seven years. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Labor Day weekend travel will see suspended highway lane closures across New York to ease congestion. [Read](https://news.google.?oc=5)
